title: Countries with the largest gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Country United States has the highest GDP in billion U.S. dollars and Switzerland has the lowest GDP in billion U.S. dollars.
The highest value at Country United States is 29.97x times more than the lowest value at Switzerland.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars 21439.45 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Switzerland where Country is 715.36.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
Second maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars is found at Country China.
Country United States has 29.97 times more GDP in billion U.S. dollars than Country Switzerland which is has the lowest.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars at Country United States is 21439.45 , second place is China at 14140.16, and thirdly is Japan at 5154.48.
The Country Switzerland has 6.12 times less GDP in billion U.S. dollars than average.
